seasons.title: DreamWorks Kung Fu Panda Awesome Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Po explains the meaning of "excellence of self," shares the wisdom of the Furious Five and uncovers the legend of three of kung fu's greatest heroes.
episodes.title: Play All Two: Kung Fu Panda Awesome Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Po explains to some young rabbits what it means to achieve "excellence of self" and shares the wisdom of Viper, Tigress, Monkey, Crane and Mantis.
episodes.title: Secrets of the Furious Five

episodes.synopsis: Po and the Furious Five uncover the legend of three of kung fu's greatest heroes: Master Thundering Rhino, Master Storming Ox and Master Croc.
episodes.title: Secrets of the Masters

video.title: DreamWorks Kung Fu Panda Awesome Secrets
video.synopsis: In this pair of adventures, Po tells the story of how masters Thundering Rhino, Storming Ox and Croc met and takes on Shifu's biggest challenge yet.
